<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shadow](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2793)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
<trait label="Shadow" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=693" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 227 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto light or medium armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Armor etched with this rune takes on a hazy black appearance. You gain a +1 item bonus to [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) checks while wearing the armor.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
